subtests.name: e.style['border'] = "1px dotted red" should set the property value
e.style['border'] = "green double thin" should set the property value
e.style['border-top'] = "thin" should set the property value
e.style['border-right'] = "double" should set the property value
e.style['border-bottom'] = "green" should set the property value
e.style['border-left'] = "1px dotted red" should set the property value
